sec.p: As shown in Table 1, 26 different components were identified in ZEO, representing 97.23%, of total EO. General chemical profile of ZEO was characterized by an abundance concentration of thymol (44%). In addition to thymol, carvacrol (14.04%) and p-cymene (11.15%), as main constituents, and traces of linalool, ϒ-terpinene, and α-Pinene were also found in ZEO.
